ResourceHeader.Description: Summary science data from SCATHA instruments (SC1, SC2, SC3, SC10, and SC11). One minute resolution processed at Aerospace from full-resolution data files.

InformationURL.Name: SCATHA web page at the Boston University
InformationURL.Description: Web page providing access to the SCATHA science summary data, spacecraft description paper, and summary plots.

InformationURL.Name: Data Recovery from SCATHA Satellite
InformationURL.Description: NASA/ESA report describing preparation of the science summary CDF files.

AccessURL.Name: SCATHA repository at BU
AccessURL.Description: Boston University-hosted science summary files for SCATHA (Spacecraft Charging at High Altitude). One CDF file per day, all instruments included.

Parameter.Name: NSSDC Standard Time
Parameter.Description: Midpoint of the high resolution data averaged into each parameter.

Parameter.Name: Averaging time interval
Parameter.Description: Except where noted, all parameters are averages of the high resolution data available from the corresponding measurement over the period of length 'AVEINT' with midpoint at time 'EPOCH'.

Parameter.Name: Mag. field in GSM coordinates
Parameter.Description: From 4 s/s SC11 values averaged over AveInt time interval centered at Epoch time.

Parameter.Name: Count rate error of averaged B-field coordinates
Parameter.Description: Count Rate error of corresponding x-, y- and z- fields of B_GSM - SQRT( Sum of counts).

Parameter.Name: E-field VLF wave amplitude
Parameter.Description: Electric field VLF wave amplitudes at 8 frequencies - From  SC1-8A data averaged over 16 second period at 1sample/sec. Converted to science units using calibration data  Values within 30 seconds of time in Epoch interpolated to Epoch using IDL function NR_SPLINE.

Parameter.Name: E-field VLF peak wave amplitude
Parameter.Description: Electric field VLF peak wave amplitudes at each of 8 frequencies from 16 second average of 1sample/sec values. Peak of these averages chosen from 1 minute around the time in Epoch. Converted to science units using calibration values.

Parameter.Name: E-field VLF center frequency
Parameter.Description: Electric field VLF frequency range center values for values stored in EVLFAmp and EVLFPAmp.

Parameter.Name: E-field VLF upper frequency range value
Parameter.Description: Electric field VLF frequency range maximum values for values stored in EVLFAmp and EVLFPAmp.

Parameter.Name: E-field VLF lower frequency range value
Parameter.Description: Electric field VLF frequency range minimum values for values stored in EVLFAmp and EVLFPAmp.

Parameter.Name: B-field VLF wave amplitude
Parameter.Description: Magnetic field VLF wave amplitudes at 4 frequencies - From  SC1-8A data averaged over 16 second period at 1sample/sec. Converted to science units using calibration data  Values within 30 seconds of time in Epoch interpolated to Epoch using IDL function NR_SPLINE.

Parameter.Name: Peak B-field VLF peak wave amplitude
Parameter.Description: Magnetic field VLF peak wave amplitudes at each of 4 frequencies from 16 second average of 1sample/sec values. Peak of these averages chosen from 1 minute around the time in Epoch. Converted to science units using calibration values.

Parameter.Name: B-field VLF center frequency
Parameter.Description: Magnetic field VLF frequency range center values for values stored in BVLFAmp and BVLFPAmp.

Parameter.Name: B-field VLF upper frequency range value
Parameter.Description: Magnetic field VLF frequency range maximum values for values stored in BVLFAmp and BVLFPAmp.

Parameter.Name: B-field VLF lower frequency range value
Parameter.Description: Magnetic field VLF frequency range minimum values for values stored in BVLFAmp and BVLFPAmp.

Parameter.Name: Common mode S/C potential, +/-15 volts
Parameter.Description: Common mode S/C potential, +/-15 volts - From SC10. Averaged over 1min from 2sample/sec data.

Parameter.Name: Common mode S/C potential, +/-300 volts
Parameter.Description: Common mode S/C potential, +/-300 volts - From SC10. Averaged over 1min from 2sample/sec data.

Parameter.Name: Common mode S/C potential, +/-5000 volts
Parameter.Description: Common mode S/C potential, +/-5000 volts - From SC10. Averaged over 1min from 2sample/sec data.

Parameter.Name: DC E-field magnitude low gain
Parameter.Description: DC Electric field magnitude low gain range (gain = 0.025) - From SC10. Averaged from 2 samples/sec.

Parameter.Name: RMS E-field amplitude
Parameter.Description: DC Electric field RMS magnitude of AC E-field (gain = 2.5) - from SC10. 1 minute RMS of 2 samples/sec data, less average over that minute.

Parameter.Name: DC E-field magnitude high gain
Parameter.Description: DC Electric field magnitude high gain range (gain = 0.25) - From SC10. Averaged from 2 samples/sec.

Parameter.Name: E-field ELF wave amplitude
Parameter.Description: Average Electric field ELF wave amplitudes in 4 frequency ranges - From SC10. 1min average of 1sample/sec.
Parameter.Caveats: Stored as voltage from telemetry, not calibrated to physical units.

Parameter.Name: Peak E-field ELF wave amplitude
Parameter.Description: Peak Electric field wave amplitudes in 4 ELF frequency ranges - From SC10. 1min maximum of 1sample/sec.
Parameter.Caveats: Stored as voltage from telemetry, not calibrated to physical units.

Parameter.Name: E-field ELF upper frequency range value
Parameter.Description: Maximum frequency values for Electric field ELF frequency range(s) - for values stored in EELFAmp and EELFPAmp.

Parameter.Name: E-field ELF lower frquency range value
Parameter.Description: Minimum frequency values for Electric field ELF frequency range(s) - for values stored in EELFAmp and EELFPAmp.

Parameter.Name: B-field ELF wave amplitude
Parameter.Description: Average Magnetic field wave amplitudes in 4 ELF frequency ranges - From SC10. 1min average of 1sample/sec.
Parameter.Caveats: Stored as voltage from telemetry, not calibrated to physical units.

Parameter.Name: Peak B-field ELF wave amplitude
Parameter.Description: Peak Magnetic field wave amplitudes in 4 ELF frequency ranges - From SC10. 1min maximum of 1sample/sec.
Parameter.Caveats: Stored as voltage from telemetry, not calibrated to physical units.

Parameter.Name: B-field ELF upper frequency range value
Parameter.Description: Maximum frequency values for Magnetic field ELF frequency range(s) - for values stored in BELFAmp and BELFPAmp.

Parameter.Name: B-field ELF lower frequency range value
Parameter.Description: Minimum frequency values for Magnetic field ELF frequency range(s) - for values stored in BELFAmp and BELFPAmp.

Parameter.Name: Differential electron flux perpendicular to B
Parameter.Description: Differential electron number flux perpendicular to B in 10 energy ranges - Calculated pitch angles are 90 +/- 20 deg to the magnetic field - Data acquired by SC2-3  (mounted on the satellite body) using program #1 energy steps (7 steps from .20 - 20keV) and SC3 at energies 57, 98 and 140keV. Energy bins assume deltaE/E=0.07 for SC2 and 0.1 for SC3 (programmable).

Element.Name: Differential electron number flux perpendicular to B 187eV
Differential electron number flux perpendicular to B 446eV
Differential electron number flux perpendicular to B 1090eV
Differential electron number flux perpendicular to B 2580eV
Differential electron number flux perpendicular to B 4520eV
Differential electron number flux perpendicular to B 10950 eV
Differential electron number flux perpendicular to B 19.4 keV
Differential electron number flux perpendicular to B 57keV
Differential electron number flux perpendicular to B 98keV
Differential electron number flux perpendicular to B 140keV

Parameter.Name: E-perp differential flux fractional error
Parameter.Description: E-perp differential flux fractional error - 10 count rate errors of values stored in EPpDfFlx = 1 / SQRT( SUM( counts ) ).

Parameter.Name: Differential electron flux parallel to B
Parameter.Description: Differential electron number flux parallel to B in 10 energy ranges - Calculated pitch angles are 0 +/- 30 deg or 180 +/- 30 deg to the magnetic field - Data acquired by SC2-3 using program #1 energy steps (7 steps from .20 - 20keV) and SC3 at energies 57, 98 and 140keV.

Element.Name: Differential electron number flux parallel to B 187eV
Differential electron number flux parallel to B 446eV
Differential electron number flux parallel to B 1090eV
Differential electron number flux parallel to B 2580eV
Differential electron number flux parallel to B 4520eV
Differential electron number flux parallel to B 10950 eV
Differential electron number flux parallel to B 19.4 keV
Differential electron number flux parallel to B 57keV
Differential electron number flux parallel to B 98keV
Differential electron number flux parallel to B 140keV

Parameter.Name: E-parl differential flux fractional error
Parameter.Description: E-parl differential flux fractional error - 10 count rate errors of values stored in EPlDfFlx = 1 / SQRT( SUM( counts ) ).

Parameter.Name: Differential electron flux center energy
Parameter.Description: Differential electron flux center energy - 10 reference energies associated with variables EPpDfFlx, EEPpDfFlx, EPlDfFlx and EEPlDfFlx.

Parameter.Name: Electron energy flux perpendicular to B
Parameter.Description: Electron energy flux perpendicular to B over .20-20keV energy range - uses 60 second average differential energy fluxes from SC2-3 step program #1 (energies defined by variable EDfFlxEn) and programs #2 and #3 if available - otherwise interpolations to those energies are done using IDL function NR_SPLINE.

Parameter.Name: Electron number flux perpendicular to B
Parameter.Description: Electron number flux perpendicular to B over .20-20keV energy range - uses 60 second average differential fluxes from SC2-3 step program #1 (energies defined by variable EDfFlxEn) and programs #2 and #3 if available - otherwise interpolations to those energies are done using IDL function NR_SPLINE.

Parameter.Name: Electron energy flux parallel to B
Parameter.Description: Electron energy flux parallel to B over .20-20keV energy range - uses 60 second average differential energy fluxes from SC2-3 step program #1 (energies defined by variable EDfFlxEn) and programs #2 and #3 if available - otherwise interpolations to those energies are done using IDL function NR_SPLINE.

Parameter.Name: Electron number flux parallel to B
Parameter.Description: Electron number flux parallel to B over .20-20keV energy range - uses 60 second average differential fluxes from SC2-3 step program #1 (energies defined by variable EDfFlxEn) and programs #2 and #3 if available - otherwise interpolations to those energies are done using IDL function NR_SPLI      .

Parameter.Name: Differential proton flux perpendicular to B
Parameter.Description: Differential proton number flux perpendicular to B in 10 energy ranges - Calculated pitch angles are 90 +/- 20 deg (SC2-3) and 90 +/- 10 deg (SC2-6) to the Magnetic field - Data acquired by SC2-3 using program #1 energy steps (7 steps from .15 - 15keV) and SC2-6 at energies 36, 71 and 133keV. Energy bins assume deltaE/E=0.1.

Element.Name: Differential proton number flux perpendicular to B 154eV
Differential proton number flux perpendicular to B 360eV
Differential proton number flux perpendicular to B 880eV
Differential proton number flux perpendicular to B 2060eV
Differential proton number flux perpendicular to B 3.6keV
Differential proton number flux perpendicular to B 8.8keV
Differential proton number flux perpendicular to B 15.6keV
Differential proton number flux perpendicular to B 36keV
Differential proton number flux perpendicular to B 71keV
Differential proton number flux perpendicular to B 133keV

Parameter.Name: P-perp differential flux fractional error
Parameter.Description: P-perp differential flux fractional error - 8 count rate errors of values stored in PPpDfFlx = 1 / SQRT( SUM( counts ) ).

Parameter.Name: Differential proton flux parallel to B
Parameter.Description: Differential proton number flux parallel to B in 8 energy ranges - Calculated pitch angles are 0 +/- 30 deg or 180 +/- 30 deg to the magnetic field - Data acquired by SC2-3 using program #1 energy steps (7 steps from .15 - 15keV) and SC2-6 at energies 36, 71 and 133keV.

Element.Name: Differential proton number flux parallel to B 154eV
Differential proton number flux parallel to B 360eV
Differential proton number flux parallel to B 880eV
Differential proton number flux parallel to B 2060eV
Differential proton number flux parallel to B 3.6keV
Differential proton number flux parallel to B 8.8keV
Differential proton number flux parallel to B 15.6keV
Differential proton number flux parallel to B 36keV
Differential proton number flux parallel to B 71keV
Differential proton number flux parallel to B 133keV

Parameter.Name: P-parl differential flux fractional error
Parameter.Description: P-parl differential flux fractional error - 10 count rate errors of values stored in PPlDfFlx = 1 / SQRT( SUM( counts ) ).

Parameter.Name: Differential proton flux center energy
Parameter.Description: Differential proton flux center energy - 10 reference energies associated with variables PPpDfFlx, PEPpDfFlx, PPlDfFlx and PEPlDfFlx.

Parameter.Name: Proton energy flux perpendicular to B
Parameter.Description: Proton energy flux perpendicular to B over .15-15keV energy range - uses 60 second average differential energy fluxes from SC2-3 step program #1 (energies defined by variable PDfFlxEn) and programs #2 and #3 if available - otherwise interpolations to those energies are done using IDL function NR_SPLINE.

Parameter.Name: Proton number flux perpendicular to B
Parameter.Description: Proton number flux perpendicular to B over .15-15keV energy range - uses 60 second average differential fluxes from SC2-3 step program #1 (energies defined by variable PDfFlxEn) and programs #2 and #3 if available - otherwise interpolations to those energies are done using IDL function NR_SPLINE.

Parameter.Name: Proton energy flux parallel to B
Parameter.Description: Proton energy flux parallel to B over .15-15keV energy range - uses 60 second average differential energy fluxes from SC2-3 step program #1 (energies defined by variable PDfFlxEn) and programs #2 and #3 if available - otherwise interpolations to those energies are done using IDL function NR_SPLINE.

Parameter.Name: Proton number flux perpendicular to B
Parameter.Description: Proton number flux paralel to B over .15-15keV energy range - uses 60 second average differential fluxes from SC2-3 step program #1 (energies defined by variable PDfFlxEn) and programs #2 and #3 if available - otherwise interpolations to those energies are done using IDL function NR_SPLINE.

Parameter.Name: Electron density (.1-20keV)
Parameter.Description: Electron density in energy range .1-20keV - From SC2-3 using average differential number fluxes in the time interval from step program #1 (see EDfFlxEn) and step programs #2 and/or #3 to create the integration energy range 87eV to 19.4keV. Trapezoid integration, pitch angles 9020.

Parameter.Name: Electron (.1-20keV) drift velocity perpendicular to B
Parameter.Description: Electron drift velocity perpendicular to B of electrons in the energy range .1-20keV and having a pitch angle of 90 +/- 20 deg to the magnetic field - (see EDensity for description of source. Trapezoid integration.

Parameter.Name: Electron pressure (.1-20keV)
Parameter.Description: Electron pressure in range .1-20keV of electrons in the energy range .04-20keV and having a pitch angle of 90 +/- 20 deg to the magnetic field - (see EDensity for description of source.) Trapezoid integration.

Parameter.Name: Electron average energy (.1-20keV)
Parameter.Description: Electron average energy Calculated from differential number flux values derived from SC2-3 energy step programs #1 and from programs #2 and/or #3 - same source as for EDensity. Trapezoid integration, pitch angles 9020.

Parameter.Name: Proton density (.1-133keV)
Parameter.Description: Proton density in energy range .1-133keV - From SC2-3 step program #1 (see PDfFlxEn) and#2 and/or #3 (integration range SC2-3 is .1 - 15.6keV) and from SC2-6 36, 71 and 133keV channel data if available.  Integration is done over just the SC2-3 range (.1-15.6keV) if SC2-6 133keV data is not available - see character 8 in variable Status%SC_SP. Trapezoid integration, pitch angles 9020.

Parameter.Name: Proton (.1-15keV) drift velocity perpendicular to B
Parameter.Description: Proton drift velocity perpendicular to B of electrons in the energy range .1-15.6keV and having a pitch angle of 90 +/- 20 deg to the magnetic field - (see PDensity for description of source.) Trapezoid integration.

Parameter.Name: Proton pressure (.1-133keV)
Parameter.Description: Proton pressure in energy range .1-133keV (or .1-15.6keV if SC2-6 133keV data is not available - check character 8 of variable Status%SC_SP) of protons in the time interval and having a pitch angle of 90 +/- 20 deg ( 90 +/- 10 deg for SC2-6 data) to the magnetic field - (see PDensity for description of source. Trapezoid integration.

Parameter.Name: Proton average energy (.1-133keV)
Parameter.Description: Proton average energy in energy range .1-133keV (or .1-15.6keV if SC2-6 133keV data is not available check character 8 of variable Status%SC_SP) - same source as for PDensity. Trapezoid integration, pitch angles 9020.

Parameter.Name: S/C geographic longitude
Parameter.Description: Spacecraft Geographic Longitude (0-360 deg E.) - Interpolated at interval midpoint time EPOCH using Ephemeris data.

Parameter.Name: S/C geographic latitude
Parameter.Description: Spacecraft Geographic Latitude (+/- 90 deg - Interpolated at interval midpoint time EPOCH using Ephemeris data.

Parameter.Name: S/C geocentric radius
Parameter.Description: Spacecraft Geocentric Radius (km) - Interpolated at interval midpoint time EPOCH using Ephemeris data.

Parameter.Name: S/C position  (ECI coordinates)
Parameter.Description: Spacecraft location x-, y- and z-position (km) in ECI  coordinate system - Interpolated at interval midpoint time EPOCH using Ephemeris data.

Parameter.Name: S/C velocity (ECI coordinates)
Parameter.Description: Spacecraft x-, y- and z- velocity (km/s) in ECI coordinate system - Interpolated at interval midpoint time EPOCH using Ephemeris data.

Parameter.Name: Magnetic local time at equator
Parameter.Description: Magnetic local time at equator (hrs) - Interpolated at interval midpoint time EPOCH using Ephemeris data.

Parameter.Name: Magnetic latitude
Parameter.Description: Magnetic latitude (degs) - Interpolated at interval midpoint time EPOCH using Ephemeris data.

Parameter.Name: L - shell
Parameter.Description: L-shell value Interpolated at interval midpoint time EPOCH using Ephemeris data.

Parameter.Name: B equator model
Parameter.Description: B equator from IGRF 1965.0 / Olsen-Pfitzer model - Interpolated at interval midpoint time EPOCH using Ephemeris data.

Parameter.Name: Angle between B-field and S/C spin axis
Parameter.Description: Angle between B-field and S/C spin axis using Model B-field and S/C attitude data interpolated to the midpoint time EPOCH using Ephemeris data.

Parameter.Name: Model mag. field coordinates
Parameter.Description: Bx, By and Bz from IGRF 1965.0 / Olsen-Pfitzer model - Interpolated at interval midpoint time EPOCH using Ephemeris data.

Parameter.Name: Ion/Electron gun operation flag
Parameter.Description:
Ion/Electron gun operation flag:
      
      * bit 0 (electron gun) 0/1 => OFF/ON,
      * bit 1 (ion gun) 0/1 => OFF/ON.

Parameter.Name: Variable quality indicator
Parameter.Description:
Variable quality indicator - see global attribute Status_key:
      
    * Status[0]
    - '0'=Bad data
    - '1'=Use with caution
    - '2'=OK
    - 'F'=Not Supplied
    - '4'=Attitude partly non-fitted
    - '5'=Attitude all non-fitted
    - '6'=No Attitude data available
    * Status[1]
    - 'O'=B-field - OK
    - 'C'=B-field - Use with caution
    - 'M'=B-field - Not Supplied
    - 'B'=B-field - Bad data
    - '4'=Attitude partly non-fitted
    - '5'=Attitude all non-fitted
    - '6'=No Attitude data available
    * Status[2]
    - 'O'=VLF - OK - Normal ant. switching
    - 'C'=VLF - Caution - missing E or M
    - 'M'=VLF - Not Supplied 
    - 'B'=VLF - Bad data
    - '1'=VLF - E-normal; M-abnormal
    - '2'=VLF - E-abnormal; M-normal
    - '3'=VLF - E-abnormal; M-abnormal
    * Status[3]
    - 'O'=SC Common - OK
    - 'C'=SC Common - Use with caution
    - 'M'=SC Common - Not Supplied
    - 'B'=SC Common - Bad data
    * Status[4]
    - 'O'=ELF - OK
    - 'C'=ELF - Use with caution
    - 'M'=ELF - Not Supplied
    - 'B'=ELF - Bad Data
    * Status[5]
    - 'O'=E-Flux - OK
    - 'C'=E-Flux - Use with caution
    - 'M'=E-Flux - Not Supplied
    - 'B'=E-Flux - Bad data
    * Status[6]
    - 'O'=E-Moment - OK
    - 'C'=E-Moment - Use with caution
    - 'M'=E-Moment - Not Supplied
    - 'B'=E-Moment - Bad data
    * Status[7]
    - 'O'=P-Flux - OK
    - 'C'=P-Flux - Use with caution
    - 'M'=P-Flux - Not Supplied
    - 'B'=P-Flux - Bad data
    - '4'=Attitude partly non-fitted
    - '5'=Attitude all non-fitted
    - '6'=No Attitude data available
    * Status[8]
    - 'O'=P-Moment - OK
    - 'C'=P-Moment - Use with caution
    - 'M'=P-Moment - Not Supplied
    - 'B'=P-Moment - Bad data
    - '1'=P-Moment - Uses flux LE 71.0 keV
    - '4'=Attitude partly non-fitted
    - '5'=Attitude all non-fitted
    - '6'=No Attitude data available
    * Status[9]
    - 'O'=Ephemeris - OK
    - 'C'=Ephemeris - Use with caution
    - 'M'=Ephemeris - Not Supplied
    - 'B'=Ephemeris - Bad data
    * Status[10]
    - 'O'=Gun - OK
    - 'C'=Gun - Use with caution
    - 'M'=Gun - Not Supplied
    - 'B'=Gun - Bad data
